title: Purse, 1640–1700
medium:
Medium: silk, silver-wrapped silk, silver wire
Technique: tapestry woven
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Folding flat pocketbook in an envelope shape with pattern of flowers in a vase. Large loop of gold cord to fasten flap. Edges bound with narrow metal braid and lined with pink silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 1640–1700.
1640–1700. Medium: silk, silver-wrapped silk, silver wire
Technique: tapestry woven. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-55-10.
